Entry.JapaneseText: くっ……どうして街の中にまでバイラスが……！
Entry.EnglishText: Ghh... Why are there Biruses inside the village...?!

Entry.JapaneseText: もしかしたら、これも人々の負の感情がもたらした 災いのひとつなのかもしれんな……
Entry.EnglishText: Perhaps everyone's negative emotions have brought about this disaster as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: 負の感情ってそんなに強いものなの？ 一体、何なの？
Entry.EnglishText: Are those emotions really that powerful? How the heck could they do that?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ヒトの心<White>が生み出す力というのは 人智を越えている……
Entry.EnglishText: The power brought forth by the Human heart is beyond our comprehension...

Entry.JapaneseText: 正しき心以上に、悪しき心というのは 強くなりやすいものだからな……
Entry.EnglishText: It is far easier for a wicked heart to grow in strength compared to a righteous one, after all...
